gradeLevel: Grade: 8, Unit 5: Functions and Volume, Lesson 2: Introduction to Functions
activityPurpose:
Introduce students to functions by writing rules based on input-output pairs in tables.
Define a function as a rule producing one output for each input.
Set the foundation for future lessons expanding on function representations.

lessonLink.text: Lesson link (click here to view the full lesson page)

description: Students write rules based on input-output pairs represented in tables and are introduced to the concept of function through these rules.
